titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Cyber Security Awareness Month and raising awareness and enhancing the state of cybersecurity in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
10/30/2013--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of National Cyber Security Awareness Month.
Commends the work of the National Initiative for Cybersecurity Education and all such public and private entities that support that effort.
Recognizes "STOP. THINK. CONNECT." as the national cybersecurity awareness campaign to educate people of the United States and help all citizens stay safer and more secure online.
Congratulates the National Cyber Security Alliance, the Multi-State Information Sharing and Analysis Center, Department of Homeland Security (DHS), and other organizations working to improve cybersecurity in the United States.
